error_bad_recipient: You cannot award OP a %s as the moderators feel that allowing so would corrupt the %s system. If you were trying to show the OP how to award a %s, please include the symbol in a reddit quote/code, or do so [here](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose/?to=%s&subject=remind&message=%s) by clicking 'send'. Thank you.
error_length: This %s is currently disallowed as your comment doesn't include enough text ([comment rule 4](http://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/rules#wiki_rule_4)). Please add an explanation for how /u/%s changed your view in an edit. Responding to my comment will cause me to recheck yours. Thank you.
error_submission_history: You have already awarded /u/%s a %s in this comment tree. [See here](http://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/deltabot) for an explanation of the delta system and its restrictions. Thank you.
congrats_first_body:
Congratulations! You've earned your first %s!

As you may already know, a %s (Δ) is given when a comment has changed someone's view. For a more detailed explanation of the %s system, [see here](http://www.reddit.com/r/%s/wiki/%s).

I have updated your user flair and created [your own wiki page](/r/%s/wiki/user/%s) which will be updated every time you earn a %s. If you do well, you may find yourself on our [scoreboards](http://www.reddit.com/r/%s/wiki/scoreboards).

Good luck, and happy CMVing!

_____

*[^I ^am ^a ^bot](https://github.com/PixelOrange/MARS)^, ^and ^this ^action ^was ^performed ^automatically. ^Please [^contact ^the ^moderators](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=/r/%s) ^if ^you ^have ^any ^further ^questions ^or ^concerns.*
remind:
To award a %s, the following criteria must be met:

1. A valid %s symbol (mobile users: type !%s) must appear somewhere in the message.

2. The comment must be at least %s long.

3. The %s cannot be awarded to the redditor that submitted this CMV topic.
remove_low_effort: This %s has been removed as your comment doesn't include enough text ([comment rule 4](http://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/rules#wiki_rule_4)). Please add an explanation for how /u/%s changed your view in an edit. Responding to my comment will cause me to recheck yours. Thank you.
remove_remind: This %s has been removed as it appears you accidentally awarded one while showing someone else how to use the %s system. To avoid this, include the symbol in a reddit quote or code, as I [will ignore this](http://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/deltabot#wiki_ignored_deltas). Thank you.
remove_abuse: This %s has been removed as the moderators believe you are misusing or abusing the %s system.
stop_body:
%s has been issued a STOP command and is shutting down. Command issued by %s.

Reason: %s Δ
